channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- FormCraft – Contact Form Builder for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- FormCraft – Contact Form Builder for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-1647|2024-08-03T00:10:03.693Z -- unknown -- formcraft%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The FormCraft WordPress plugin before 1.2.6 does not sanitise and escape Field Labels, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
